text: Ngenkathi labo abangakholwanga befaka ezinhliziyweni zabo intshisekelo, intshisekelo yokungazi ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi wehlisela phansi ukuthula kwakhe phezulu kwesithunywa sakhe kanye naphezulu kwabakholwayo futhi wabanqumela igama lobumnene futhi babefanelwe yikona futhi bevumelekile kukona, futhi ngasosonke isikhathi uMvelinqangi uyisazi sazo zonke zinto
